name: Foreword
description:
Foreword is a puzzle game where you get points for making as many words as you can by changing just one letter of the given four letter word.

For example if the given word was "tins" you could make: tons, sins, bins etc. and show off your knowledge of the English  language to family and friends!

That's why the game is called Foreword, it's like a pun, see? Fourword.. Forwords... or something like that. There's probably a better pun name in there somewhere.

All words are in English i'm afraid, and apologies in advance if your favorite slang isn't counted!
